title: With sound, meet a better version of yourself

description: The system will monitor your breathing status in real-time and automatically adjust the beat frequency to guide you into different states of consciousness:

instructions.headphones: Please use stereo headphones to achieve the binaural beat effect.
instructions.microphone: If you agree to use your microphone, please place it close to your mouth and nose, and we will attempt to guide you into a deeper state.

labels.filePrivacyMsg: Audio files are processed locally and will not be uploaded.
